title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.9 - Water
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.9 - Water

State Regulations

Enough potable water from an approved source is to be available in the establishment for food preparation, cleaning and sanitizing utensils and equipment, and handwashing. If not otherwise readily available, a heating facility capable of producing enough hot water for these purposes shall be provided in the establishment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-2.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
